::Prowl::

The concern in Prowl's optics grows as Iron Raptor's hand drops from his 
cheek. He should have taken her to the CR chamber. He stands up and sits by 
her on her bed, putting a hand on her waist.

This was obvioustly not good, he thinks to himself, Iron Raptor looked like 
she needded repairs. Repairs! That, he could do! His transmetal 2 spark had 
saved his life many times in the past. Maybe ... just maybe, it could be used 
to repair Iron Raptor.

He reaches for her blanket and slides it gently off her, so that his spark 
would have access to her. He takes a deep breath. Here goes nothing. His 
chestplate opens, showing his spark cavity.

Prowl leans forward, suddenly realizing that his face was now very close to 
hers. The mechfluid in his veins speeds up as he kisses her, sliding a hand 
around her waist. His spart emerges from his chest, releasing repairing coils 
at Iron Raptor's chest.
